posts.postHeadline: Want to get into AI and ML career path. Any devs working in ML on here?
posts.postBody: I’ve completed my bachelor in Computer Science Engineering. I want to get into Artificial Intelligence and machine learning, but I have no idea on where to start. I would appreciate any working professionals on the field of Software Engineering to provide guidance to me to get started.

I’m looking for English tutors who can help me improve my English speaking skills. I’m a native Hindi speaker and I’m fluent in English, but I want to improve my English speaking skills. I’m looking for someone who can help me with my pronunciation and accent.

posts.postHeadline: Looking for teammates for a hackathon
posts.postBody: Hey! I'm Billy. I'm seeking teammates for an upcoming web3 hackathon. I'm a full-stack developer with experience in React, Node, and Solidity. I'm looking for teammates who are interested in building a decentralized application.
I was wondering if I can find a coding mentor here to help me work through some of the issues I’m going through with my game.
Hi, I'm Charlie. I do developer relations at TensorFlow. I'm passionate about machine learning and I love to share my knowledge with others. I'm also a big fan of Python and JavaScript.
